question: Which is the first private company in India, to successfully design, develop and test full solid propulsion rocket stage?
explanation:
Hyderabad-based Skyroot Aerospace has successfully test fired a solid propulsion rocket stage (named Kalam-5).
This is the first private company in India has successfully designed, developed and tested a full solid propulsion rocket stage. It is built with advanced carbon composite structure in an automated process. The company is also to test-fire Vikram-1 launch vehicleâ€™s third stage (Kalam-100).
